name: You Stole My Heart! Global Game Jam 2021
name_original: You Stole My Heart! Global Game Jam 2021
description:
Game did it for Global Game Jam 2021 - "Lost & Found"

A cardiologist has made you fall in love with her —she stole your heart... literally. Luckily, your heart managed to escape at the last minute, but your body will bleed out if you can't get it back before it's too late. Go up to the Surgery Room and find your body before it says enough! 

Collect blood bags to recover your energy, buy some power-ups in the vending machines and avoid all the evil nurses that will try to catch you! Did no one ever tell you that love hurts?

Controls:
WASD: Move
Shift: Sprint
E: Interact with Vending Machines and activate the Power-Ups.

Power-Ups:

- Coffee:  You can run faster. 

- Blood Bag: You recover to Maximum your Blood Bar.

- Defibrillator: You can resurrect if some nurse kills you. You can't activate this power-up until you dead.

- Strip: You can stop the bleed for a few seconds.
